name: Late photographer 2
description:
Game type:
This is a game of changing clothes for beautiful women.
You may change the character's hair, clothes, jewelry, etc.

You can change the character's hair, coat, skirt, trousers, socks, coat, shoes, etc.
There are hundreds of clothes.
You can match it at will according to your preferences.
There can be thousands of wearing schemes.
You can also take photos to save your wearing scheme.
Photo album function, which can show your wearing scheme.

Random mode:
Play shooting games to unlock specific clothes.
There are 3 shooting speeds and 12 weapons.
Every time you destroy an enemy plane, change a dress at random.

Endless mode:
You need to upgrade your weapons.
The enemy plane's blood volume increases gradually.
Cooperate with the big move of weapons to destroy the enemy aircraft.
When you feel that your attack power is not enough, you can choose to retain some attributes to reincarnate.
